contentfulSermon.title: Beautiful Mess: Week 10 - Freedom vs Fear

fields.notesFormatted:
PAUL’S ANSWER LONG ANSWER

1 Corinthians 8:1-10:33

8:1-8 An idol is nothing – but not everyone knows that.

8:9-13 Love & concern for others should guide our freedom.

9:1-23 How Paul applied these principles to his own ministry.

9:24-10:13 A good start is no guarantee of a happy ending.

THEREFORE… - 1 Corinthians 10:14-33

  1. Never participate in the actual worship of a false god or idol.

  2. Don’t worry about indirect “spiritual contamination.”

  3. Adjust your actions based on who you are with.
